header.title: AI Intern | MS Computer Science @ Northeastern University | AI/ML, Edge Computing, Distributed Systems

resume.summary: Highly motivated MS CS student with **4+ years of professional software engineering experience** at LSEG and Infosys, specializing in **scalable backend systems, data processing, and cloud infrastructure**. Proven ability to **build, train, and optimize ML models** (Deep RL, Computer Vision) and handle **large datasets for feature engineering**. Eager to apply strong problem-solving skills and a growth mindset to contribute to Armada's mission of bridging the digital divide with AI at the edge. **F1-CPT eligible** for an 8-month co-op (Jan-Aug 2026) with geographic flexibility.

skills.items: Python, Java, Go, JavaScript, TypeScript, SQL, C++, C#
PyTorch, TensorFlow, Keras, Model Training, Model Optimization, GPU Training, ML Inference
Deep Learning, Neural Networks, CNN, Deep Reinforcement Learning, Computer Vision
Pandas, NumPy, ETL Pipelines, SQL Optimization, Query Optimization, Batch Processing, Workflow Automation
AWS (Lambda, SQS, API Gateway), Kubernetes, Docker, CI/CD, Terraform
Microservices, REST APIs, Event-Driven Systems, Distributed Systems
MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, DynamoDB, Database Design, Indexing, Stored Procedures

bullets: Engineered a **high-throughput, event-driven data pipeline** on AWS, processing **7.5M+ XML compliance records** into standardized JSON for 180+ countries.
Achieved **40 records/second processing speed** and **99.9% data integrity** by optimizing concurrent execution and batch processing strategies.
Improved **turnaround time by 35%** for high-priority KYC/AML screening and **reduced request latency by 40%** through Lambda-based API tuning.
Architected a **multi-queue priority routing framework** and developed scalable microservices, ensuring **zero-downtime migrations** and 99.9% uptime.
Implemented robust security hardening using **AWS WAF, IAM, and TLS**, reducing potential security incidents by **50%** across critical services.
Developed **high-throughput Python ETL pipelines** for critical data processing, improving system throughput by **3x** through concurrent execution.
Automated complex data extraction and transformation workflows, **reducing manual interventions by 50%** and enhancing operational efficiency.
Optimized database query performance and microservices integration patterns, leading to a **35% reduction in data processing latency**.
Designed and implemented comprehensive monitoring, scheduling, and error-handling frameworks, improving data extraction **accuracy by 20%**.

projects.title: Dino Game Deep RL Agent
projects.tech: Python, PyTorch, Deep Reinforcement Learning, ResNet, Computer Vision, OpenCV
projects.bullet1: Developed an **autonomous AI agent** using **Double Deep Q-Network (DDQN)** with a **15-layer ResNet** to master Chrome's Dino game.
projects.bullet2: Implemented **GPU-accelerated training** with a 8,500-capacity replay buffer and real-time screen capture, demonstrating **model training and optimization**.

projects.title: Face Recognition & Validation System
projects.bullet1: Engineered an **end-to-end face recognition system** utilizing a **custom 5-layer Convolutional Neural Network (CNN)** architecture.
projects.bullet2: Achieved **88.2% validation accuracy** with progressive filter reduction and dropout regularization, showcasing **real-time inference** capabilities.

projects.title: Data Analysis on PUBG
projects.tech: Python, Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Jupyter Notebook
projects.bullet1: Conducted **large-scale statistical analysis** on **4.4 million PUBG match records** to identify key win rate predictors across game modes.
projects.bullet2: Developed **data preprocessing and visualization pipelines**, performing **feature engineering** and correlation analysis to derive actionable insights.
